benchmark_details.name: Proper Noun Diacritization for Arabic Wikipedia
benchmark_details.overview: We introduce a new manually diacritized dataset of Arabic proper nouns of various origins paired with their English Wikipedia equivalents, enabling the study of joint diacritization and transliteration.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To facilitate further research on Arabic Wikipedia proper noun diacritization and improve the quality of Arabic NLP resources.

data.source: Manually selected from Arabic Wikipedia entries and annotated with English glosses.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on exact matches and edit distances between generated outputs and gold-standard diacritizations.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance in producing correct diacritizations.
methodology.baseline_results: GPT-4o achieved a best accuracy of 73% on the task.
methodology.validation: Results were validated through inter-annotator agreement, and performance evaluations were conducted with varied input formats.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: All data sourced from publicly available resources, no personal data involved.
